Battlefy | Engineering | Vancouver, Canada | Full-Time | Remote

Battlefy is the leading esports technology platform that works with world-class companies like Amazon, Riot Games, Blizzard Entertainment, Nintendo, Coca Cola, Red Bull, Alienware, and many more to power their eSports infrastructure (managing tournaments, prizing, teams, real-time stats, seeding and brackets, content creation, and communications).

We're looking for motivated engineers that have a passion for esports and gaming. React/NodeJS/MongoDB/Postgres.

Reach out to jaime@battlefy.com if interested! Or, here's the job posting: https://battlefy.workable.com/j/81C755C92B
